document_data.name: ''Dumathoin's Bracers''
document_data.mainbody: e bracers offered great protection to the wearer from physical and magical threats, including freezing, burning, acidic, sonic, and shocking assaults. They also improved the wearer's agility and speed quite a bit.
document_data.Powers: The bracers offered great protection to the wearer from physical and magical threats, including freezing, burning, acidic, sonic, and shocking assaults. They also improved the wearer's agility and speed quite a bit.
document_data.History: The bracers were once used by [[Dumathoin Thunderstone]], Captain of the Guard during an attack upon Thunderholme. The bracers were later found in the lair treasury of the [[shadow dragon]] [[Aurgloroasa]] in the 1480s [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
